div1.head: Photograph of an aerial view of Quemados, Cuba with an overlay designating significant sites marked by [Philip Showalter Hench,] [n.d.]
div1.p:
↓ N
Gen Lee St
RR▵
▵= triangle
Santa Rosa St
▭ site of bachelor
officer's quarters
1900
□ ←yellow fever
huts
(tree & sign gone now)
□ site of Reed's lab
The stream was here
in 1900. See
old maps
concrete bed for old
dry stream
In 1900 the La Playa dirt↑
road ran straight but later
to make room for new hospital
buildings at the Cuban military
Hosp the road was curved
nearer the RR track
Cuidad militar
La Playa Road
□ Where Dr. Lazear
buried
La Plaza RR
The old RR track
←disappears a little
“north” of here
